title: curried vegetables
description: This one-pot vegetarian curry recipe is ever so simple to make and warms you up on a wintry evening.
ingredients: 1 small red onion, peeled, finely sliced
1 small aubergine, trimmed, diced into 2cm/¾in cubes
½ vegetable stock cube, dissolved in 200ml/7fl oz water
salt and freshly ground black pepper
